dcterms:creator: E. A. Papatheofanous
D. Reisis
K. Nikitopoulos
dcterms:description: An FPGA-based LDPC accelerator for 5G open RAN was introduced, investigating the feasibility and efficiency of cloud native 5G RAN acceleration by offloading LDPC decoding to FPGA.
dcterms:title: LDPC Hardware Acceleration in 5G Open Radio Access Network Platforms

dcterms:creator: A. Kelkar
C. Dick
dcterms:description: A GPU-based practical implementation of inline hardware acceleration for AAL high-PHY profile (i.e., O-DU L1) is described, focusing on real-time communication among CPU, GPU, and NIC.
dcterms:title: Aerial: a GPU Hyper-converged Platform for 5G

dcterms:creator: E. Agostini
dcterms:description: A new open-sourced library called GPUdev is introduced in DPDK to enhance communications between CPU, NIC, and GPU, enabling efficient, low-latency communication.
dcterms:title: Boosting Inline Packet Processing using DPDK and GPUdev with GPUs
